Close-up of the customer smiling at the mirror in new glasses. Soft flattering light, shallow depth of field, natural movement.

Cinematic montage of an experienced Asian woman optometrist in a calm clinic with phoropter and slit lamp. Wide shot guiding a vision exam and lens choices. Macro close-up of phoropter dials and eye reflections under soft light. Medium shot using a slit lamp to examine the eye surface with precise, gentle motion. Over-the-shoulder shot reviewing retinal images on a monitor and explaining findings. Close-up writing a prescription and discussing eye-health prevention. Photorealistic textures, subsurface scattering, shallow depth of field, natural movement.
